metadata.synopsis: Combat AD for Sarevok at the Murder Tribunal. Sarevok is presiding over the Murder Tribunal to judge Bhaalists who aspire to become Unholy Assassins.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to the Murder Tribunal: "oe MT_Court"- This AD will play during combat with Sarevok: S_LOW_MurderTribunal_Sarevok_ae9f784a-ea64-4297-95a7-8377e85231b6

0.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
0.text: I will not tolerate impudence. This place shall be your grave.
